node.title: PE/BRASS SWIVEL NUT THREADED UNION
node.shortdescription: PE/brass female threaded transition adapter with swivel nut. Made by injectionmoulding, it is used for connection of different materials (one of which is polyethylene) on potable water piping systems.
node.content: PE/brass female threaded transition adapter with swivel nut. Made by injectionmoulding, it is used for connection of different materials (one of which is polyethylene) on potable water piping systems.
node.categorieprodotto: Water>Transition fitting for water|Drinking Water|Fire fighting|Special parts
node.schedadati:
Materials
  • CW612N brass metal body according to UNI EN 12168.
  • Virgin high density polyethylene PE100 spigot, black.
  • NBR 70 Sh. A O-ring approved for gas and potable water (DVGW).
Certifications
  • ACS C.M. 25.11.02 DGS/SD7A n.571
node.infotecniche:
Technical notes
  • Metal/PE connection compliant with standard UNI 9736, with full bore passage.
  • Certified for use on potable water systems according to M.D. 174 of 2004.
  • Subject to pressure testing according to ISO 1167 and additional MACPLAST test specification.
  • Polyethylene dimensions according to UNI EN 1555-3, standard thickness SDR11.
  • PE weldable spigot for electrofusion UNI 10521 or butt welding UNI 10520.
  • Female thread, according to UNI ISO 228-1.
  • Use a hook wrench for tightening.
Additional features
  • Fitted with internal safety o-ring.
More information
  • ADZ-USA CW511L brass on request
Standards
  • UNI EN 12201-3
  • ISO 4427-3
  • UNI EN ISO 228-1

node.title: THREADED LINE HYDRANT
node.shortdescription: Hydrant column for in-line installation onirrigation systems. Connection to the system by means of electro-fusion sleeve coupler or butt welding. Sealed male threaded outlet.
node.content: Hydrant column for in-line installation onirrigation systems. Connection to the system by means of electro-fusion sleeve coupler or butt welding. Sealed male threaded outlet.
node.schedadati:
Materials
  • Black high density polyethylene PE100 TEE and pipe.
  • Carbon steel tubing according to ISO 3183/API 5L, galvanised on the inside and on the outside according to UNI EN 10240-A1 (compliant with DM174 for compatibility with potable water,) and externally coated in a triple layer of black LDPE class R3R according to UNI 9099 (art.005)
  • NBR 70 Sh. A O-ring on terminal, approved for gas and potable water (DVGW).
Certifications
node.infotecniche:
Technical notes
  • Polyethylene dimensions according to UNI EN 12201-3, standard thickness SDR11.
  • Polyethylene butt welding according to UNI 10520.
  • Tee or reduced tee according to UNI EN 12201-3 for DE 90, 110, 125 hydrants.
  • MKM welding according to UNI 7616.
  • MKM fitting for DE 140, 160, 180, 200 hydrants.
  • Polyethylene pipe according to UNI EN 12201-2.
  • Tapered male terminal thread according to UNI EN 10226-1.
Additional features
  • Approved for use on potable water systems according to M.D. 174 of 2004.
More information
  • Metal/PE connection compliant with standard UNI 9736, with full bore passage and insulation against external infiltratio
  • Tapping terminal with internal safety o-ring.
Standards
  • UNI EN 12201-3
  • ISO 4427-3
  • UNI EN 10226-1

node.title: ONE-BOLT SLEEVE REPAIR CLAMP
node.shortdescription: Split sleeve clamp with one bolt for temporary repair of all types of water or gas pipes. Compatible with potable water, it can be used on cracks (even cross cracks) with depths of up to 80%. Also available with stainless steel nuts and bolts for higher corrosion resistance.
node.content: Split sleeve clamp with one bolt for temporary repair of all types of water or gas pipes. Compatible with potable water, it can be used on cracks (even cross cracks) with depths of up to 80%. Also available with stainless steel nuts and bolts for higher corrosion resistance.
node.schedadati:
Materials
  • Ductile cast iron clamp GJS-600-3 according to UNI EN 1563, with white protective coating obtained through hot-dip galvanisation, according to UNI EN ISO 1461.
  • Galvanised steel fixing bolts: screw M10 (D21-D64) M12 (D65-D229) according to UNI EN ISO 898-1 with square below the head ref. DIN/ISO 603, flanged nut DIN 6923. white electrolytic zinc coating.
  • NBR rubber gasket, 60 shore hardness, attached to the stainless steel strip in compliance with DM174/2004 for use on potable water systems.
  • AISI 304 stainless steel strip, thickness 0.60mm (D21-D60) and 0.80mm (D60-D229).
  • Stainless steel (AISI 304) bolts on request.
Certifications
node.infotecniche:
Technical notes
  • Repair of rigid pipelines made of steel, cast iron, fibre cement and PVC.
  • Certified for use on potable water systems according to M.D. 174 of 2004.
  • Subject to pressure testing in laboratory.
  • Application on all types of surfaces, even on rough surfaces.
Additional features
  • Operating temperature -10°C / 60°C.
More information
  • Do not expose to direct sunlight (to preserve the condition of the gasket).
  • see the recommended applications to choose the right clamp.
  • follow the directions provided to determine the length.
Standards

node.title: UNIVERSAL JOINT PE/MULTIMATERIAL (CAST IRON, STEEL, PVC AND OTHER)
node.shortdescription: PE/multimaterial (cast iron, steel, PVC and other) transition fitting. The universal joint allows the insertion of pipes with diameters within a certain range, thegasket ensures the sealing of the pipe once the bolts are tightened. It can be used on low pressure tap water or gas piping systems, it does not serve as locking joint.

  • NBR 70 shore gasket suitable for gas pipelines according to UNI EN 682.

  • Repair of rigid pipelines made of steel, cast iron, fibre cement and PVC.
  • Certified for use on potable water systems according to M.D. 174 of 2004.
  • Subject to pressure testing in laboratory.
  • Application on all types of surfaces, even on rough surfaces.
Additional features
  • Operating temperature -10°C / 60°C.
More information
  • Do not expose to direct sunlight (to preserve the condition of the gasket).
  • see the recommended applications to choose the right clamp.
  • follow the directions provided to determine the length.
Standards

node.title: DOUBLE BAND REPAIR CLAMP WITH FIVE BOLTS
node.shortdescription: Double band clamp with five bolts for temporary repair of all types of water or gas pipes. Compatible with potable water, it is used on different types of cracks (even cross cracks) with depths of up to 80%. It can also be used on cross cracks with depths exceeding 80% as long as the piping is well anchored since the clamp does not serve as locking joint. Also available with stainless steel nuts and bolts for higher corrosion resistance.
node.content: Double band clamp with five bolts for temporary repair of all types of water or gas pipes. Compatible with potable water, it is used on different types of cracks (even cross cracks) with depths of up to 80%. It can also be used on cross cracks with depths exceeding 80% as long as the piping is well anchored since the clamp does not serve as locking joint. Also available with stainless steel nuts and bolts for higher corrosion resistance.
node.schedadati:
Materials
  • Ductile cast iron clamp GJS-500-7 according to UNI EN 1563, with electrostatic epoxy coating of medium thickness 250µm,nontoxic, according to ISO 14901,
  • Galvanised steel fixing bolts: screw M14 according to UNI EN ISO 898-1 with square below the head ref. DIN/ISO 603, nutISO 4032 (UNI 5587), washer DIN125A/ISO7089, white electrolytic protective zinccoating.
  • NBR rubber gasket, 60 shore hardness, attached to the stainless steel strip in compliance with DM174/2004 for use on potable water systems.
  • AISI 304 stainless steel strip, thickness 0.80mm.
  • Stainless steel (AISI 304) bolts on request.
Certifications

node.title: PE/STEEL CURVED WITH THREADED TERMINAL – SIZES ON REQUES
node.shortdescription: Curved PE/steel transition fitting with threaded terminal (customisable version ofart. 002). Made by injection moulding, itis used for connection of different materials (one of which is polyethylene) on fuel gas piping systems.
node.content: Curved PE/steel transition fitting with threaded terminal (customisable version ofart. 002). Made by injection moulding, itis used for connection of different materials (one of which is polyethylene) on fuel gas piping systems.
node.schedadati:
Materials
  • Carbon steel tubing according to SO 3183/API 5L covered on the outside in a triple layer of yellow LDPE class R3R in accordance with DIN30670.
  • Virgin high density polyethylene PE100 spigot, black.
  • NBR 70 Sh. A O-ring approved for gas and potable water (DVGW).
Certifications
  • UNI EN 1555-3 (KIWA KIP-095784)
  • UNI EN ISO 15494 (KIWA KIP-095785)
  • DVGW G5600-1 (DW-7521CR0259)
node.infotecniche:
Technical notes
  • Metal/PE connection compliant with UNI 9736, with full bore passage and insulation against external infiltrations.
  • Subject to pressure testing according to ISO 1167 and additional MACPLAST test specification.
  • Serves as dielectric connection according to UNI 7129, as it is triple layer coated.
  • Polyethylene dimensions according to UNI EN 1555-3, standard thickness SDR11.
  • Metal dimensions according to ISO 3183.
  • Tapered male threaded terminal in accordance with UNI EN 10226 (exISO7/1).
Additional features
  • Fitted with internal safety o-ring.
More information
  • NPT threads on request.
Standards
  • UNI EN 1555-3
  • ISO 4437-3
  • UNI EN ISO 15494
  • UNI EN 10226-1

node.title: BULKHEAD FITTING
node.shortdescription: PE/brass bulkhead fitting. Made by injection moulding, it is used for connection of PE pipes to tanks or cisterns made of fibreglass or other non-weldable material. The grip to the tank wall is ensured byflanges fitted with sealing O-rings. It can be used on potable water piping systems.

The grip to the tank wall is ensured byflanges fitted with sealing O-rings. It can be used on potable water piping systems.

Materials

Certifications
node.infotecniche:
Technical notes
  • Metal/PE connection compliant with standard UNI 9736, with full bore passage.

node.title: THREADED LINE HYDRANT WITH ONE SOCKET
node.shortdescription: Hydrant column for in-line installation onirrigation systems. Connection to the system by means of electro-fusion sleeve coupler or butt welding on one side and quick coupling on the other side. Sealed male threaded outlet.
node.content: Hydrant column for in-line installation onirrigation systems. Connection to the system by means of electro-fusion sleeve coupler or butt welding on one side and quick coupling on the other side. Sealed male threaded outlet.
node.schedadati:
Materials
  • Black high density polyethylene PE100 TEE, pipe and socket.
  • Carbon steel tubing according to ISO 3183/API 5L, galvanised on the inside and on the outside according to UNI EN 10240-A1 (compliant with DM174 for compatibility with potable water,) and externally coated in a triple layer of black LDPE class R3R according to UNI 9099 (art.005)
  • NBR 70 Sh. A O-ring on terminal, approved for gas and potable water (DVGW).
  • EPDM socket lip gaskets according to UNI EN 681-2.
Certifications
node.infotecniche:
Technical notes
  • Polyethylene dimensions according to UNI EN 12201-3, standard thickness SDR11.
  • Polyethylene butt welding according to UNI 10520.
  • Tee or reduced tee according to UNI EN 12201-3 for DE 90, 110, 125 hydrants.
  • MKM welding according to UNI 7616.
  • MKM fitting for DE 140, 160, 180, 200 hydrants.
  • Polyethylene pipe according to UNI EN 12201-2.
  • Tapered male terminal thread according to UNI EN 10226-1.
Additional features
  • Approved for use on potable water systems according to M.D. 174 of 2004.
More information
  • Metal/PE connection compliant with standard UNI 9736, with full bore passage and insulation against external infiltratio
  • Tapping terminal with internal safety o-ring.
  • PE socket according to UNI 9561 with locking ring and elastomer lip gasket.
Standards
  • UNI EN 12201-3
  • ISO 4427-3
  • UNI EN 10226-1

  • Metal/PE connection compliant with standard UNI 9736, with full bore passage.
  • Subject to pressure testing according to ISO 1167 and additional MACPLAST test specification.
  • Polyethylene dimensions according to UNI EN 1555-3, standard thickness SDR11.
  • PE weldable spigot for electrofusion UNI 10521 or butt welding UNI 10520.
  • Tapered male thread, according toANSI/ASME B1.20.1.
  • Use a hook wrench for tightening.
Additional features
  • Fitted with internal safety o-ring.
Standards
  • UNI EN 12201-3
  • ISO 4427-3
  • UNI EN ISO 15494
  • ANSI/ASME B1.20.1

node.content: PE/steel transition fitting with VICTAULIC terminal. Made by injection moulding, used for connection of different materials (one of which is polyethylene) on tap and potable water piping systems.

Materials
  • Carbon steel tubing according to ASTM A106 with white electrolytic zinc coating and externally coated in a triple layer of black LDPE class R3R according to UNI 9099,
  • High density polyethylene PE100 spigot.

node.infotecniche:
Technical notes
  • Metal/PE connection compliant with UNI 9736, with full bore passage and insulation against external infiltrations.
  • Subject to pressure testing according to ISO 1167 and additional MACPLAST test specification.
  • Polyethylene dimensions according to UNI EN 1555-3, standard thickness SDR11.
  • Serves as dielectric connection according to UNI 7129, as it is triple layer coated.
  • Metal dimensions according to ASTM A106.
  • VICTAULIC terminal according to STANDARD GROOVE SPECIFICATIONS 25.01.
Additional features
  • Fitted with internal safety o-ring.
Standards
  • UNI EN 12201-3
  • ISO 4427-3

node.title: STUB END / FLANGE KIT
node.shortdescription: Kit consisting of PE stub flange and PP flange with drill holes for connection according to EN 1092-1. Made by injection moulding from d140, it is fitted with an additional reinforcement flange. The spot-facing inside the flange has a self-centring and anti-loosening effect. It can be used on tap water piping systems.
node.content: Kit consisting of PE stub flange and PP flange with drill holes for connection according to EN 1092-1. Made by injection moulding from d140, it is fitted with an additional reinforcement flange. The spot-facing inside the flange has a self-centring and anti-loosening effect. node.title: TAPPING SADDLE (PE/PVC PIPELINES)
node.shortdescription: Tapping saddle with two shells for PE/PVCpipeline flow derivation. It can be usedpermanently even on potable water pipelines. Stainless steel nuts and bolts and thick electrostatic epoxy coating for long-term corrosion resistance.
node.content: Tapping saddle with two shells for PE/PVCpipeline flow derivation. It can be usedpermanently even on potable water pipelines. Stainless steel nuts and bolts and thick electrostatic epoxy coating for long-term corrosion resistance.
node.schedadati:
Materials
  • Covers made of ductile cast iron GJS-500-7 according to UNI EN 1563, with bakedelectrostatic epoxy powder coating (RAL5005), thick.250µm, nontoxic.
  • EPDM sealing double thickness gasket with lamellar sealing seat and profiled edges, compliant with DM174/2004 for use on potable water systems.
  • AISI 304 stainless steel fixing nuts, bolts and washers.
Certifications

Technical notes
  • Offtake inlet for plastic pipelines (PE/PVC).

node.shortdescription: PE/steel transition fitting with threadedterminal. Made by injection moulding, itis used for connection of different materials (one of which is polyethylene) on fuel gas piping systems.
node.content: PE/steel transition fitting with threadedterminal. Made by injection moulding, itis used for connection of different materials (one of which is polyethylene) on fuel gas piping systems.
node.schedadati:
Materials
  • Carbon steel tubing according to ISO 3183/API 5L covered on the outside in a triple layer of yellow LDPE class R3R in accordance with DIN30670.
  • Virgin high density polyethylene PE100 spigot, black.
  • NBR 70 Sh. A O-ring approved for gas and potable water (DVGW).
Certifications
  • UNI EN 1555-3 (KIWA KIP-095784)
  • UNI EN ISO 15494 (KIWA KIP-095785)
  • DVGW G5600-1 (DW-7521CR0259)
node.infotecniche:
Technical notes
  • Metal/PE connection compliant with UNI 9736, with full bore passage and insulation against external infiltrations.
  • Subject to pressure testing according to ISO 1167 and additional MACPLAST test specification.
  • Serves as dielectric connection according to UNI 7129, as it is triple layer coated.
  • Polyethylene dimensions according to UNI EN 1555-3, standard thickness SDR11.
  • Metal dimensions according to ISO 3183.
  • Tapered male threaded terminal in accordance with UNI EN 10226 (exISO7/1).
Additional features
  • Fitted with internal safety o-ring.
More information
  • NPT threads on request.
Standards
  • UNI EN 1555-3
  • ISO 4437-3
  • UNI EN ISO 15494
  • UNI EN 10226-1

node.title: PE/STEEL STRAIGHT WITH WELDABLE TERMINAL
node.shortdescription: PE/steel transition fitting with weldableterminal. Made by injection moulding, itis used for connection of different materials (one of which is polyethylene) on water or fuel gas piping systems. Compatible with potable water.
node.content: PE/steel transition fitting with weldableterminal. Made by injection moulding, itis used for connection of different materials (one of which is polyethylene) on water or fuel gas piping systems. Compatible with potable water.
node.categorieprodotto: Water>Transition fitting for water|Drinking Water|Fire fighting|Gas>Transition fitting for gas|Special parts
node.schedadati:
Materials
  • Carbon steel tubing according to ISO 3183/API 5L, galvanised on the inside and on the outside according to UNI EN 10240-A1 (compliant with DM174 for compatibility with potable water, up to 8") and externally coated in a triple layer of black LDPE class R3R according to UNI 9099.
  • Virgin high density polyethylene PE100 spigot, black.
  • NBR 70 Sh. A O-ring approved for gas and potable water (DVGW).
  • Powder coated S355J2H steel outer sealing ring (thick.200µm).
Certifications
  • UNI EN 1555-3 (KIWA KIP-095784)
  • UNI EN 12201-3 D.M.174 (KIWA KIP-095789)
  • UNI EN ISO 15494 (KIWA KIP-095785)
  • DVGW G5600-1 (DW-7521CR0259)
  • DVGW GW335-B4 (DW-7511CR0156)
node.infotecniche:
Technical notes
  • Metal/PE connection compliant with UNI 9736, with full bore passage and insulation against external infiltrations.
  • Certified for use on potable water systems according to M.D. 174 of 2004.
  • Subject to pressure testing according to ISO 1167 and additional MACPLAST test specification.
  • Serves as dielectric connection according to UNI 7129, as it is triple layer coated.
  • Polyethylene dimensions according to UNI EN 1555-3, standard thickness SDR11.
  • Metal dimensions according to ISO 3183.
  • Weld-on terminal chamfered at 37.5° degree angle according to EN 12627.
Additional features
  • Fitted with internal safety o-ring.
More information
  • Injection moulded fittings up to DE225 x 8".
  • Larger diameters are produced through mechanical assembly with outer sealing ring.
  • S8 / SDR17 spigot on request from DE250x8".
Standards
  • UNI EN 1555-3
  • UNI EN 12201-3
  • ISO 4437-3
  • ISO 4427-3
  • UNI EN ISO 15494
  • UNI EN 10226-1

node.shortdescription: PE/steel transition fitting with TEE terminal for tapping TEE saddles. Made by injection moulding, it is used on medium pressure gas systems for type IV pipelines(up to 5bar).
node.content: PE/steel transition fitting with TEE terminal for tapping TEE saddles. Made by injection moulding, it is used on medium pressure gas systems for type IV pipelines(up to 5bar).

  • Steel closing cap ASTM A105 with doubleVITON sealing o-ring.

Additional features

node.shortdescription: Curved transition fitting with antifreezecoating in rigid cellular polyurethane. Application on fire-fighting systems for hydrant box connection. Female threaded outlet.
node.content: Curved transition fitting with antifreezecoating in rigid cellular polyurethane. Application on fire-fighting systems for hydrant box connection. Female threaded outlet.

  • Carbon steel tubing according to UNI EN10255.
  • External coating in rigid polyurethane coating, closed cells, Shore D55)
  • NBR 70 Sh. A transition O-ring, approved for gas and potable water (DVGW).
Certifications
node.infotecniche:
Technical notes
  • Metal/PE connection compliant with UNI 9736, with full bore passage and insulation against external infiltrations.
  • Approved for use on potable water systems according to M.D. 174 of 2004.
  • Subject to pressure testing according to ISO 1167 and additional MACPLAST test specification.
  • Polyethylene dimensions according to UNI EN 1555-3, standard thickness SDR11.
  • Metal dimensions according to ISO 3183.
  • Tapered female threaded terminal in accordance with UNI ISO 228-1.
  • According to UNI 10779 Fire extinguishing systems – Hydrant network.
Additional features
  • Fitted with internal safety o-ring.
Standards
  • UNI 10779

node.title: ONE-BOLT REPAIR CLAMP
node.shortdescription: Simple clamp with one bolt for temporary repair of all types of water or gas pipes.Compatible with potable water, it is used for repairing small cracks. Also availablewith stainless steel nuts and bolts for higher corrosion resistance.
node.content: Simple clamp with one bolt for temporary repair of all types of water or gas pipes.Compatible with potable water, it is used for repairing small cracks. Also availablewith stainless steel nuts and bolts for higher corrosion resistance.
node.schedadati:
Materials
  • Ductile cast iron clamp GJS-600-3 according to UNI EN 1563, with white protective coating obtained through hot-dip galvanisation, according to UNI EN ISO 1461.
  • Galvanised steel fixing bolts: screw M10 (D21-D64) M12 (D65-D229) according to UNI EN ISO 898-1 with square below the head ref. DIN/ISO 603, flanged nut DIN 6923. white electrolytic protective zinc coating.
  • NBR rubber gasket, 60 shore hardness, attached to the stainless steel strip in compliance with DM174/2004 for use on potable water systems.
  • AISI 304 stainless steel strip, thickness 0.60mm (D21-D60) and 0.80mm (D60-D229).
  • Stainless steel (AISI 304) bolts on request.
Certifications
node.infotecniche:
Technical notes
  • Repair of rigid pipelines made of steel, cast iron, fibre cement and PVC.
  • Certified for use on potable water systems according to M.D. 174 of 2004.
  • Subject to pressure testing in laboratory.
  • Application on all types of surfaces, even on rough surfaces.
Additional features
  • Operating temperature -10°C / 60°C.
More information
  • Do not expose to direct sunlight (to preserve the condition of the gasket).
  • see the recommended applications to choose the right clamp.
  • follow the directions provided to determine the length.
Standards

node.title: THREE-BOLT REPAIR CLAMP
node.shortdescription: Split sleeve clamp with three bolts for temporary repair of all types of water or gas pipes. Compatible with potable water,it is used on many types of cracks (evencross cracks) with depths of up to 80%. Itcan also be used on cross cracks with depths exceeding 80% as long as the pipingis well anchored since the clamp does notserve as locking joint. Also available with stainless nuts and bolts for higher corrosion resistance.
node.content: Split sleeve clamp with three bolts for temporary repair of all types of water or gas pipes.   • NBR rubber gasket, 60 shore hardness, attached to the stainless steel strip in compliance with DM174/2004 for use on potable water systems.
  • AISI 304 stainless steel strip, thickness 0.80mm.
  • Stainless steel (AISI 304) bolts on request.
Certifications
